item.description: Forks Over Knives will be screened at Red River Theaters in Concord, NH for one week, beginning Friday, Sept. 9th at 7:00 PM. Following the Friday eve screening, a panel composed of Cynthia Scrimshaw, RD and Gita Patel, RD will answer questions from the audience. It's being held in the screening room (a very small room), so purchasing tickets in advance is recommended.
item.name: Attend the screening of Forks Over Knives
